entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
